name: SpaceSpaceSpacetheGame
description:
Game made in one hour for a sudden surprise 1-hour game jam between three other lemons.

To win: Collect the GrimboCoins and proceed to the green square! Boom, new level!

Featuring unique gamer-controls!
Left hand:

  • W - Move down!
  • S - No.
  • X - Move up!
  • A - Move right!
  • D - Move left!
  • E - Restart room!
  • F - Restart game!!!!!
  • C - Jump to a random exciting spot!

Right hand:

  • I - Jump up!
  • J - Jump left!
  • K - No!!!!!
  • L - Jump right!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  • M - Jump down :-)

More features:

  • No sound for your concentration!
  • Many smiles!
  • The main character with no name! Had no time to give him one! :-) :-)
  • Interesting video-game title name, really makes you think! Hmm.
  • Speedrunning potential!
  • Wow!
